comment: Trusted online advice is helping patients avoid unnecessary visits. A much-needed support.
Affordable surgeries are now within reach for many. Great initiative by Vaidya Bandhu.
Proud to help patients get life-saving surgeries they couldn’t otherwise afford.
Discounted tests ensure early detection without financial burden. A big win for patients.
All healthcare services in one place. It’s efficient and patient-friendly.
Second opinions have helped many avoid unnecessary treatments. A truly valuable service.
